Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the dormitory authority of the state of New York to fulfill certain monetary commitments
Summary: Requires the dormitory authority of the state of New York to fulfill all outstanding monetary commitments made to any local government for a fiscal year prior to allocating any moneys to economic development grant programs for the following fiscal year.
LawCode: Add ยง1678-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the dormitory authority of the state of New York to fulfill certain monetary commitments
